snippet: The House majority leader, Representative Eric Cantor of Virginia, will block a vote next week on legislation giving a path to citizenship for illegal immigrants who serve in the military, Mr. Cantor’s spokesman said Friday.
abstract: Rep Eric Cantor of Virginia, House majority leader, will block a vote on legislation giving a path to citizenship for illegal immigrants who serve in the military.
lead_paragraph: The House majority leader, Representative Eric Cantor of Virginia, will block a vote next week on legislation giving a path to citizenship for illegal immigrants who serve in the military, Mr. Cantor’s spokesman said Friday.

headline.main: Cantor to Block Vote on Citizenship
headline.print_headline: Cantor to Block Vote on Citizenship

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
